channel.title: Waiting inbetween actions
channel.description:
I'm making a fletching class and I have everything down except for how to make it wait after it cuts a log. It just instantly cuts all the logs into bows. Can anyone help me figure out how to make it wait? I know it has something to do with system.currentTimeMillis().
thanks
